price: zato, veličaj Gospodara svoga i hvali Ga, i budi od onih što na sedždu padaju,
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
